Text: Half-year figures, released last week, showed strong growth and brokers expect an 82 per cent surge in 2019 revenues to £26 million and a doubling of the dividend to 3.2p.
Cause: Half-year figures, released last week, showed strong growth
Effect: brokers expect an 82 per cent surge in 2019 revenues to £26 million and a doubling of the dividend to 3.2p.
Sentence: <e1>Half-year figures, released last week, showed strong growth</e1> and <e2>brokers expect an 82 per cent surge in 2019 revenues to £26 million and a doubling of the dividend to 3.2p.</e2>
